name: Adams Legal Group, PLLC
overview: Adams Legal Group, PLLC is a Morgantown WV law firm, focusing on medical malpractice, auto wrecks, and other personal injury claims, while also providing competent business law services and representation. We are located in Morgantown, WV and provides legal services in both West Virginia and Pennsylvania. Our experienced attorneys also provide family law - chiefly divorce and child custody representation, as well as criminal legal representation in Morgantown, WV and the surrounding areas.
